item.description:
Our first meetup of 2012 will be presented by, Eric Fernberg, who will be speaking on the RightJS JavaScript library. RightJS is a very light-weight, high-performance JavaScript DOM library, with a similar feature-set to libraries like jQuery.

 

Join us as Eric demonstrates:

  • Performance tests: jQuery vs. RightJS
  • How to get started using RightJS
  • Library Overview: Available Plugins, Useful Tips on events, etc
  • How to combine Backbone.js and RightJS (without jQuery)



 

 

After the presentation | demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any JavaScript-related issues members are facing.

This meeting is being hosted by SignedOn, located on Floor 4 at 373 Washington St, Down-Town Crossing, MA. A one minute walk from State T station.

Pizza and drinks will also be provided by Google. What generous hosts!

Doors open at 6:30pm, and the talk begins aprox. 6:45-7:15pm
item.name: RightJS - High Performance JavaScript
